RXCLKSRC.name: RXCLKSRC
RXCLKSRC.description: Sample Clock source selection for Flash Reading

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Dummy Read strobe generated by FlexSPI Controller and loopback internally.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Dummy Read strobe generated by FlexSPI Controller and loopback from DQS pad.

enumeratedValues.name: val3
enumeratedValues.description: Flash provided Read strobe and input from DQS pad

ARDFEN.name: ARDFEN
ARDFEN.description: Enable AHB bus Read Access to IP RX FIFO.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: IP RX FIFO should be read by IP Bus. AHB Bus read access to IP RX FIFO memory space will get bus error response.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: IP RX FIFO should be read by AHB Bus. IP Bus read access to IP RX FIFO memory space will always return data zero but no bus error response.

ATDFEN.name: ATDFEN
ATDFEN.description: Enable AHB bus Write Access to IP TX FIFO.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: IP TX FIFO should be written by IP Bus. AHB Bus write access to IP TX FIFO memory space will get bus error response.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: IP TX FIFO should be written by AHB Bus. IP Bus write access to IP TX FIFO memory space will be ignored but no bus error response.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 1

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 2

enumeratedValues.name: val2
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 3

enumeratedValues.name: val3
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 4

enumeratedValues.name: val4
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 5

enumeratedValues.name: val5
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 6

enumeratedValues.name: val6
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 7

enumeratedValues.name: val7
enumeratedValues.description: Divided by 8

HSEN.name: HSEN
HSEN.description: Half Speed Serial Flash Access Enable.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Disable divide by 2 of serial flash clock for half speed commands.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Enable divide by 2 of serial flash clock for half speed commands.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Doze mode support disabled. AHB clock and serial clock will not be gated off when there is doze mode request from system.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Doze mode support enabled. AHB clock and serial clock will be gated off when there is doze mode request from system.

COMBINATIONEN.name: COMBINATIONEN
COMBINATIONEN.description: This bit is to support Flash Octal mode access by combining Port A and B Data pins (A_DATA[3:0] and B_DATA[3:0]), when Port A and Port B are of 4 bit data width.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Disable.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Enable.

SCKFREERUNEN.name: SCKFREERUNEN
SCKFREERUNEN.description: This bit is used to enable SCLK output free-running. For FPGA applications, the external device may use SCLK as reference clock to its internal PLL.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Disable.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Enable.

IPGRANTWAIT.name: IPGRANTWAIT
IPGRANTWAIT.description: Timeout wait cycle for IP command grant.

AHBGRANTWAIT.name: AHBGRANTWAIT
AHBGRANTWAIT.description: Timeout wait cycle for AHB command grant.

SEQWAIT.name: SEQWAIT
SEQWAIT.description: Command Sequence Execution will timeout and abort after SEQWAIT * 1024 Serial Root Clock cycles. When sequence execution timeout occurs, there will be an interrupt generated (INTR[SEQTIMEOUT]) if this interrupt is enabled (INTEN[SEQTIMEOUTEN] is set 0x1) and AHB command is ignored by arbitrator.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: AHB RX/TX Buffer will not be cleared automatically when FlexSPI returns Stop mode ACK.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: AHB RX/TX Buffer will be cleared automatically when FlexSPI returns Stop mode ACK.

SAMEDEVICEEN.name: SAMEDEVICEEN
SAMEDEVICEEN.description: All external devices are same devices (both in type and size) for A1/A2/B1/B2.

enumeratedValues.name: individual_parallel
enumeratedValues.description: In Individual mode, FLSHA1CRx/FLSHA2CRx/FLSHB1CRx/FLSHB2CRx register setting will be applied to Flash A1/A2/B1/B2 separately. In Parallel mode, FLSHA1CRx register setting will be applied to Flash A1 and B1, FLSHA2CRx register setting will be applied to Flash A2 and B2. FLSHB1CRx/FLSHB2CRx register setting will be ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: FLSHA1CR0/FLSHA1CR1/FLSHA1CR2 register setting will be applied to Flash A1/A2/B1/B2. FLSHA2CRx/FLSHB1CRx/FLSHB2CRx will be ignored.

SCKBDIFFOPT.name: SCKBDIFFOPT
SCKBDIFFOPT.description: B_SCLK pad can be used as A_SCLK differential clock output (inverted clock to A_SCLK). In this case, port B flash access is not available. After changing the value of this field, MCR0[SWRESET] should be set.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: B_SCLK pad is used as port B SCLK clock output. Port B flash access is available.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: B_SCLK pad is used as port A SCLK inverted clock output (Differential clock to A_SCLK). Port B flash access is not available.

RESUMEWAIT.name: RESUMEWAIT
RESUMEWAIT.description: Wait cycle (in AHB clock cycle) for idle state before suspended command sequence resumed.

APAREN.name: APAREN
APAREN.description: Parallel mode enabled for AHB triggered Command (both read and write).

enumeratedValues.name: individual
enumeratedValues.description: Flash will be accessed in Individual mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Flash will be accessed in Parallel mode.

CLRAHBRXBUF.name: CLRAHBRXBUF
CLRAHBRXBUF.description: Clear the status/pointers of AHB RX Buffer. Auto-cleared.

CLRAHBTXBUF.name: CLRAHBTXBUF
CLRAHBTXBUF.description: Clear the status/pointers of AHB TX Buffer. Auto-cleared.

CACHABLEEN.name: CACHABLEEN
CACHABLEEN.description: Enable AHB bus cachable read access support.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Disabled. When there is AHB bus cachable read access, FlexSPI will not check whether it hit AHB TX Buffer.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Enabled. When there is AHB bus cachable read access, FlexSPI will check whether it hit AHB TX Buffer first.

BUFFERABLEEN.name: BUFFERABLEEN
BUFFERABLEEN.description: Enable AHB bus bufferable write access support.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Disabled. For all AHB write accesses (bufferable or non-bufferable), FlexSPI will return AHB Bus ready after all data is transmitted to external device and AHB command finished.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Enabled. For AHB bufferable write access, FlexSPI will return AHB Bus ready when the AHB command is granted by arbitrator and will not wait for AHB command finished.

READADDROPT.name: READADDROPT
READADDROPT.description: AHB Read Address option bit. This option bit is intended to remove AHB burst start address alignment limitation.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: There is AHB read burst start address alignment limitation when flash is accessed in parallel mode or flash is word-addressable.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: There is no AHB read burst start address alignment limitation. FlexSPI will fetch more data than AHB burst required to meet the alignment requirement.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: AHB read size will be decided by other register setting like PREFETCH_EN

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: AHB read size to up size to 8 bytes aligned, no prefetching

IPCMDDONEEN.name: IPCMDDONEEN
IPCMDDONEEN.description: IP triggered Command Sequences Execution finished interrupt enable.

IPCMDGEEN.name: IPCMDGEEN
IPCMDGEEN.description: IP triggered Command Sequences Grant Timeout interrupt enable.

AHBCMDGEEN.name: AHBCMDGEEN
AHBCMDGEEN.description: AHB triggered Command Sequences Grant Timeout interrupt enable.

IPCMDERREN.name: IPCMDERREN
IPCMDERREN.description: IP triggered Command Sequences Error Detected interrupt enable.

AHBCMDERREN.name: AHBCMDERREN
AHBCMDERREN.description: AHB triggered Command Sequences Error Detected interrupt enable.

IPRXWAEN.name: IPRXWAEN
IPRXWAEN.description: IP RX FIFO WaterMark available interrupt enable.

IPTXWEEN.name: IPTXWEEN
IPTXWEEN.description: IP TX FIFO WaterMark empty interrupt enable.

SCKSTOPBYRDEN.name: SCKSTOPBYRDEN
SCKSTOPBYRDEN.description: SCLK is stopped during command sequence because Async RX FIFO full interrupt enable.

SCKSTOPBYWREN.name: SCKSTOPBYWREN
SCKSTOPBYWREN.description: SCLK is stopped during command sequence because Async TX FIFO empty interrupt enable.

IPCMDDONE.name: IPCMDDONE
IPCMDDONE.description: IP triggered Command Sequences Execution finished interrupt. This interrupt is also generated when there is IPCMDGE or IPCMDERR interrupt generated.

IPCMDGE.name: IPCMDGE
IPCMDGE.description: IP triggered Command Sequences Grant Timeout interrupt.

AHBCMDGE.name: AHBCMDGE
AHBCMDGE.description: AHB triggered Command Sequences Grant Timeout interrupt.

IPCMDERR.name: IPCMDERR
IPCMDERR.description: IP triggered Command Sequences Error Detected interrupt. When an error detected for IP command, this command will be ignored and not executed at all.

AHBCMDERR.name: AHBCMDERR
AHBCMDERR.description: AHB triggered Command Sequences Error Detected interrupt. When an error detected for AHB command, this command will be ignored and not executed at all.

IPRXWA.name: IPRXWA
IPRXWA.description: IP RX FIFO watermark available interrupt.

IPTXWE.name: IPTXWE
IPTXWE.description: IP TX FIFO watermark empty interrupt.

SCKSTOPBYRD.name: SCKSTOPBYRD
SCKSTOPBYRD.description: SCLK is stopped during command sequence because Async RX FIFO full interrupt.

SCKSTOPBYWR.name: SCKSTOPBYWR
SCKSTOPBYWR.description: SCLK is stopped during command sequence because Async TX FIFO empty interrupt.

KEY.name: KEY
KEY.description: The Key to lock or unlock LUT.

BUFSZ.name: BUFSZ
BUFSZ.description: AHB RX Buffer Size in 64 bits.

MSTRID.name: MSTRID
MSTRID.description: This AHB RX Buffer is assigned according to AHB Master with ID (MSTR_ID).

PRIORITY.name: PRIORITY
PRIORITY.description: This priority for AHB Master Read which this AHB RX Buffer is assigned. 7 is the highest priority, 0 the lowest.

REGIONEN.name: REGIONEN
REGIONEN.description: AHB RX Buffer address region function enable

PREFETCHEN.name: PREFETCHEN
PREFETCHEN.description: AHB Read Prefetch Enable for current AHB RX Buffer corresponding Master.

BUFSZ.name: BUFSZ
BUFSZ.description: AHB RX Buffer Size in 64 bits.

MSTRID.name: MSTRID
MSTRID.description: This AHB RX Buffer is assigned according to AHB Master with ID (MSTR_ID).

PRIORITY.name: PRIORITY
PRIORITY.description: This priority for AHB Master Read which this AHB RX Buffer is assigned. 7 is the highest priority, 0 the lowest.

REGIONEN.name: REGIONEN
REGIONEN.description: AHB RX Buffer address region function enable

PREFETCHEN.name: PREFETCHEN
PREFETCHEN.description: AHB Read Prefetch Enable for current AHB RX Buffer corresponding Master.

BUFSZ.name: BUFSZ
BUFSZ.description: AHB RX Buffer Size in 64 bits.

MSTRID.name: MSTRID
MSTRID.description: This AHB RX Buffer is assigned according to AHB Master with ID (MSTR_ID).

PRIORITY.name: PRIORITY
PRIORITY.description: This priority for AHB Master Read which this AHB RX Buffer is assigned. 7 is the highest priority, 0 the lowest.

REGIONEN.name: REGIONEN
REGIONEN.description: AHB RX Buffer address region function enable

PREFETCHEN.name: PREFETCHEN
PREFETCHEN.description: AHB Read Prefetch Enable for current AHB RX Buffer corresponding Master.

BUFSZ.name: BUFSZ
BUFSZ.description: AHB RX Buffer Size in 64 bits.

MSTRID.name: MSTRID
MSTRID.description: This AHB RX Buffer is assigned according to AHB Master with ID (MSTR_ID).

PRIORITY.name: PRIORITY
PRIORITY.description: This priority for AHB Master Read which this AHB RX Buffer is assigned. 7 is the highest priority, 0 the lowest.

REGIONEN.name: REGIONEN
REGIONEN.description: AHB RX Buffer address region function enable

PREFETCHEN.name: PREFETCHEN
PREFETCHEN.description: AHB Read Prefetch Enable for current AHB RX Buffer corresponding Master.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: The CS interval unit is 1 serial clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: The CS interval unit is 256 serial clock cycle

CSINTERVAL.name: CSINTERVAL
CSINTERVAL.description: This field is used to set the minimum interval between flash device chip select deassertion and flash device chip select assertion. If external flash has a limitation on the interval between command sequences, this field should be set accordingly. If there is no limitation, set this field with value 0x0.

ARDSEQID.name: ARDSEQID
ARDSEQID.description: Sequence Index for AHB Read triggered Command in LUT.

ARDSEQNUM.name: ARDSEQNUM
ARDSEQNUM.description: Sequence Number for AHB Read triggered Command in LUT.

AWRSEQID.name: AWRSEQID
AWRSEQID.description: Sequence Index for AHB Write triggered Command.

AWRSEQNUM.name: AWRSEQNUM
AWRSEQNUM.description: Sequence Number for AHB Write triggered Command.

AWRWAIT.name: AWRWAIT
AWRWAIT.description: For certain devices (such as FPGA), it need some time to write data into internal memory after the command sequences finished on FlexSPI interface. If another Read command sequence comes before previous programming finished internally, the read data may be wrong. This field is used to hold AHB Bus ready for AHB write access to wait the programming finished in external device. Then there will be no AHB read command triggered before the programming finished in external device. The Wait cycle between AHB triggered command sequences finished on FlexSPI interface and AHB return Bus ready: AWRWAIT * AWRWAITUNIT

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 2 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 8 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val2
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 32 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val3
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 128 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val4
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 512 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val5
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 2048 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val6
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 8192 AHB clock cycle

enumeratedValues.name: val7
enumeratedValues.description: The AWRWAIT unit is 32768 AHB clock cycle

CLRINSTRPTR.name: CLRINSTRPTR
CLRINSTRPTR.description: Clear the instruction pointer which is internally saved pointer by JMP_ON_CS.

WMOPT1.name: WMOPT1
WMOPT1.description: Write mask option bit 1. This option bit could be used to remove AHB and IP write burst start address alignment limitation.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: DQS pin will be used as Write Mask when writing to external device. There is no limitation on AHB/IP write burst start address alignment when flash is accessed in individual mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: DQS pin will not be used as Write Mask when writing to external device. There is limitation on AHB/IP write burst start address alignment when flash is accessed in individual mode.

WMENA.name: WMENA
WMENA.description: Write mask enable bit for flash device on port A. When write mask function is needed for memory device on port A, this bit must be set.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Write mask is disabled, DQS(RWDS) pin will not be driven when writing to external device.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Write mask is enabled, DQS(RWDS) pin will be driven by FlexSPI as write mask output when writing to external device.

WMENB.name: WMENB
WMENB.description: Write mask enable bit for flash device on port B. When write mask function is needed for memory device on port B, this bit must be set.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Write mask is disabled, DQS(RWDS) pin will not be driven when writing to external device.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Write mask is enabled, DQS(RWDS) pin will be driven by FlexSPI as write mask output when writing to external device.

SFAR.name: SFAR
SFAR.description: Serial Flash Address for IP command.

IDATSZ.name: IDATSZ
IDATSZ.description: Flash Read/Program Data Size (in Bytes) for IP command.

ISEQID.name: ISEQID
ISEQID.description: Sequence Index in LUT for IP command.

ISEQNUM.name: ISEQNUM
ISEQNUM.description: Sequence Number for IP command: ISEQNUM+1.

IPAREN.name: IPAREN
IPAREN.description: Parallel mode Enabled for IP command.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Flash will be accessed in Individual mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Flash will be accessed in Parallel mode.

TRG.name: TRG
TRG.description: Setting this bit will trigger an IP Command.

CLRIPRXF.name: CLRIPRXF
CLRIPRXF.description: Clear all valid data entries in IP RX FIFO.

RXDMAEN.name: RXDMAEN
RXDMAEN.description: IP RX FIFO reading by DMA enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: IP RX FIFO would be read by processor.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: IP RX FIFO would be read by DMA.

CLRIPTXF.name: CLRIPTXF
CLRIPTXF.description: Clear all valid data entries in IP TX FIFO.

TXDMAEN.name: TXDMAEN
TXDMAEN.description: IP TX FIFO filling by DMA enabled.

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: IP TX FIFO would be filled by processor.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: IP TX FIFO would be filled by DMA.

SLVDLYTARGET.name: SLVDLYTARGET
SLVDLYTARGET.description: The delay target for slave delay line is: ((SLVDLYTARGET+1) * 1/32 * clock cycle of reference clock (serial root clock). If serial root clock is >= 100 MHz, DLLEN set to 0x1, OVRDEN set to =0x0, then SLVDLYTARGET setting of 0xF is recommended.

OVRDEN.name: OVRDEN
OVRDEN.description: Slave clock delay line delay cell number selection override enable.

OVRDVAL.name: OVRDVAL
OVRDVAL.description: Slave clock delay line delay cell number selection override value.

SEQIDLE.name: SEQIDLE
SEQIDLE.description: This status bit indicates the state machine in SEQ_CTL is idle and there is command sequence executing on FlexSPI interface.

ARBIDLE.name: ARBIDLE
ARBIDLE.description: This status bit indicates the state machine in ARB_CTL is busy and there is command sequence granted by arbitrator and not finished yet on FlexSPI interface. When ARB_CTL state (ARBIDLE=0x1) is idle, there will be no transaction on FlexSPI interface also (SEQIDLE=0x1). So this bit should be polled to wait for FlexSPI controller become idle instead of SEQIDLE.

ARBCMDSRC.name: ARBCMDSRC
ARBCMDSRC.description: This status field indicates the trigger source of current command sequence granted by arbitrator. This field value is meaningless when ARB_CTL is not busy (STS0[ARBIDLE]=0x1).

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: Triggered by AHB read command.

enumeratedValues.name: val1
enumeratedValues.description: Triggered by AHB write command.

enumeratedValues.name: val2
enumeratedValues.description: Triggered by IP command (triggered by setting register bit IPCMD[TRG]).

enumeratedValues.name: val3
enumeratedValues.description: Triggered by suspended command (resumed).

AHBCMDERRID.name: AHBCMDERRID
AHBCMDERRID.description: Indicates the sequence index when an AHB command error is detected. This field will be cleared when INTR[AHBCMDERR] is write-1-clear(w1c).

AHBCMDERRCODE.name: AHBCMDERRCODE
AHBCMDERRCODE.description: Indicates the Error Code when AHB command Error detected. This field will be cleared when INTR[AHBCMDERR] is write-1-clear(w1c).

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: No error.

enumeratedValues.name: val2
enumeratedValues.description: AHB Write command with JMP_ON_CS instruction used in the sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val3
enumeratedValues.description: There is unknown instruction opcode in the sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val4
enumeratedValues.description: Instruction DUMMY_SDR/DUMMY_RWDS_SDR used in DDR sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val5
enumeratedValues.description: Instruction DUMMY_DDR/DUMMY_RWDS_DDR used in SDR sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val6
enumeratedValues.description: Sequence execution timeout.

IPCMDERRID.name: IPCMDERRID
IPCMDERRID.description: Indicates the sequence Index when IP command error detected.

IPCMDERRCODE.name: IPCMDERRCODE
IPCMDERRCODE.description: Indicates the Error Code when IP command Error detected. This field will be cleared when INTR[IPCMDERR] is write-1-clear(w1c).

enumeratedValues.name: val0
enumeratedValues.description: No error.

enumeratedValues.name: val2
enumeratedValues.description: IP command with JMP_ON_CS instruction used in the sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val3
enumeratedValues.description: There is unknown instruction opcode in the sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val4
enumeratedValues.description: Instruction DUMMY_SDR/DUMMY_RWDS_SDR used in DDR sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val5
enumeratedValues.description: Instruction DUMMY_DDR/DUMMY_RWDS_DDR used in SDR sequence.

enumeratedValues.name: val6
enumeratedValues.description: Flash access start address exceed the whole flash address range (A1/A2/B1/B2).

enumeratedValues.name: val7
enumeratedValues.description: Sequence execution timeout.

enumeratedValues.name: val8
enumeratedValues.description: Flash boundary crossed.

ASLVLOCK.name: ASLVLOCK
ASLVLOCK.description: Flash A sample clock slave delay line locked.

AREFLOCK.name: AREFLOCK
AREFLOCK.description: Flash A sample clock reference delay line locked.

ASLVSEL.name: ASLVSEL
ASLVSEL.description: Flash A sample clock slave delay line delay cell number selection .

AREFSEL.name: AREFSEL
AREFSEL.description: Flash A sample clock reference delay line delay cell number selection.

BSLVLOCK.name: BSLVLOCK
BSLVLOCK.description: Flash B sample clock slave delay line locked.

BREFLOCK.name: BREFLOCK
BREFLOCK.description: Flash B sample clock reference delay line locked.

BSLVSEL.name: BSLVSEL
BSLVSEL.description: Flash B sample clock slave delay line delay cell number selection.

BREFSEL.name: BREFSEL
BREFSEL.description: Flash B sample clock reference delay line delay cell number selection.

ACTIVE.name: ACTIVE
ACTIVE.description: Indicates if an AHB read prefetch command sequence has been suspended.

BUFID.name: BUFID
BUFID.description: AHB RX BUF ID for suspended command sequence.

DATLFT.name: DATLFT
DATLFT.description: Left Data size for suspended command sequence (in byte).

FILL.name: FILL
FILL.description: Fill level of IP RX FIFO.

RDCNTR.name: RDCNTR
RDCNTR.description: Total Read Data Counter: RDCNTR * 64 Bits.

FILL.name: FILL
FILL.description: Fill level of IP TX FIFO.

WRCNTR.name: WRCNTR
WRCNTR.description: Total Write Data Counter: WRCNTR * 64 Bits.

RFDR[%s].name: RFDR[%s]
RFDR[%s].description: IP RX FIFO Data Register x

TFDR[%s].name: TFDR[%s]
TFDR[%s].description: IP TX FIFO Data Register x
